original_text: They shall eat the flesh that night, roasted on the fire; with unleavened bread and bitter herbs they shall eat it.
korean_text: 그 밤에 그 고기를 불에 구워 무교병과 쓴 나물과 아울러 먹되

sentences.original_text: They shall eat the flesh that night
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 밤에 그 고기를 먹으라

sentences.original_text: with unleavened bread and bitter herbs
